WHUK – Web Hosting UK Com Ltd.(www.webhosting.uk.com), a company backed by a decade of Industry experience offers fully managed VPS hosting packages at the best affordable prices. xLite Linux Virtual Machines are based on powerful servers that empower your website with unmatched performance. The VPS hosting packages offered by WHUK ensure optimum performance and offer the flexibility required to run large websites and install third party applications with ease. While the Windows VPS is powered by Hyper-V, it provides with maximum efficiency and uptime of the website.
